description: Contributed features and maintained an Android and iOS mobile application, two web applications (one legacy and one modern), a legacy REST service, and a GraphQL web API.

experience.title: Feature development
points: Developed and tested features on multiple applications across mobile and desktop devices
Discussed feature requirements with multiple colleagues across multiple departments during development
Demonstrated strong written and verbal skills through discussing software requirements through MS Team's chat, MS Team's calls, and in person discussion

experience.title: Development lifecycle
points: Researched, presented, installed, and configured software tools for improving the development work flow including git hooks and automated app versioning
Embraced and bolstered Agile work flow by creating and lobbying for a task board for tracking in progress items and reported application issues
Debugged and resolved an issue with mobile map performance by considering possible bottlenecks and investigating each one to determine the cause
Wrote a small suite of tools to improve the team's development experience and provided an installer using a series of bash scripts

experience.title: HTTP
points: Applied a knowledge of web technologies when implementing login, log out, sign up, sign up verification, and forgot password using HTTP cookies, JWT tokens, encryption and decryption of data, and HTTPS among other web technologies.

experience.title: SQL
points: Applied SQL experience to optimize legacy API calls by moving multiple database trips into a single SQL query and modifying existing SQL code

description: Created and maintained a CI/CD pipeline using Azure DevOps for a Xamarin mobile app built for both iOS and UWP devices and for an Express.js REST service.

experience.title: Mobile application
points: Created pipeline responsible for building the application and deploying the builds
Demonstrated organization and accountability by storing and managing all of the certificates and provisioning profiles for the mobile application
Developed an in-house automated version system using bash to match a versioning scheme not supported by existing tools

experience.title: Web Service
points: Researched and implemented a project repository with tools to streamline other developers setup process
Added automated builds, testing, and deployment to the development, staging, and production environments using Azure DevOps
Installed and configured tools for automated REST API documentation

experience.title: General:
points: Implemented JWT-based authentication and authorization using Auth0
Diligently diagnosed an obscure issue for three weeks and successfully resolved a build breaking bug
Demonstrated resourcefulness by using a FreeBSD VM to test bash scripts designed for a macOS build machine when a macOS system could not be provided
